data.description: Survey of Korean cinema from the Golden Age classics of the 1950s and 1960s to new blockbuster hits and art-house films throughout the contemporary period; investigate not only the major genres of Korean cinema, but also the increased recognition throughout the world of such renowned Korean auteurs as Park Chan-wook and Bong Joon-ho; discusses the issues of colonialism, national division, civil war, military dictatorships, the democratic movement, and globalization.
data.title: KOREAN CINEMA
